shop.title: Shopify Store
shop.description: The name of your Shopify store found in the URL. For example, if your URL was https://NAME.myshopify.com, then the name would be 'NAME'.

credentials.title: Shopify Authorization Method
credentials.description: The authorization method to use to retrieve data from Shopify

api_password.title: API Password
api_password.description: The API Password for your private application in the `Shopify` store.

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of the Shopify developer application.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret of the Shopify developer application.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: The Access Token for making authenticated requests.

start_date.title: Replication Start Date
start_date.description: The date you would like to replicate data from. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Any data before this date will not be replicated.
